supporting.text: The film 'Chinatown' (1974) has Roman Polanski listed as its director in official records and credits.

attacks.text: The film 'Chinatown' (1974) has Roman Polanski listed as its director in official records and credits.

Roman Polanski was not officially credited as director due to contractual disputes during production.

Polanski’s own statements and interviews confirm his role as sole director of 'Chinatown'.
Production notes from the film’s release indicate Polanski was credited as director despite disputes.

Interviews may reflect personal claims rather than definitive proof of directorship.
Contractual disputes do not necessarily override official credits established during production.

supporting.text: All motion pictures require at least one director to oversee production and creative decisions.

attacks.text: All motion pictures require at least one director to oversee production and creative decisions.

Self-directed films are still directed by individuals, so A2 remains correct.
